Task ID:
\h(«Fina»)That looks like the bridge… 
Galcian must be in there.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Well, I guess we'll just have to break that door
down, won't we?\e

\h(«Galcian»)I did not realize that there were still this
many people foolish enough to resist me.\e

\h(«Galcian»)And you, Vyse, have caused me 
more trouble than anyone.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Thanks. It's an Air Pirate's duty 
to cause trouble… I feel so accomplished.\e

\h(«Vyse»)But there's one more thing I'd like to 
accomplish… \e
\h(«Vyse»)I want to rid the world of you.\e

\h(«Galcian»)Heh heh… 
Very amusing… but this world shall be mine! 
It's a pity you won't be around to see it.\e

\h(«Galcian»)How… could… this be?!
I… I will not… be… defeated… \e

\h(«Galcian»)You may have won the battle, but I shall have my
revenge!\e

\h(«Galcian»)Fools, when will you realize that you cannot 
stop me!\e
\h(«Galcian»)Now I shall destroy every last one of you.\e

\h(«Vyse»)I thought he was too arrogant to have an escape 
pod!\e

\h(«Aika»)Vyse, he's getting away! We have to do 
something!\e

\h(«Fina»)If he gets away, he'll retreat back to Soltis 
and we'll never get a chance to stop him!\e

\h(«Vyse»)The other pirates are tied up fighting with the
Armada!\e

\h(«Gilder»)Hey… something's not right…
No… you don't think…?!\e

\h(«Galcian»)Belleza!
You… survived the attack on Valua?\e

\h(«Belleza»)Lord Galcian, so many innocent people died by 
your hand. Women and children… bled to death in
the streets… \e

\h(«Belleza»)As an Admiral in the Armada, I feel that I am
responsible for their deaths… as much as you 
are.\e

\h(«Galcian»)What… what are you doing?!
I command you to stop!!!\e

\h(«Vyse»)She… she sacrificed her own life to stop 
Galcian… \e
